WITH OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF AS ( /* 조직 및 창고 */ SELECT O1.BASE_YM , O2.PRTNR_NO , O1.OG_NM , O2.PRTNR_KNM , O2.PSTN_DV_CD , CASE WHEN O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('HR1', 'W06') THEN F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SAP_ROL_DV_CD', O2.PSTN_DV_CD) ELSE F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'MNGER_PSTN_CD', O2.PSTN_DV_CD) END AS PSTN_DV_NM /* 직급 명 */ /* , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PSTN_DV_CD', O2.PSTN_DV_CD, 'ko') AS PSTN_DV_NM 직급명 */ , NVL(O1.BLD_NM, O3.BLD_NM) AS BLD_NM , O1.OG_TP_CD FROM WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ O1 /*월조직내역*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ S1 /*월별창고내역*/ ON O1.BASE_YM = S1.APY_YM AND O1.OG_TP_CD = S1.OG_TP_CD AND O1.OG_ID = S1.OG_ID AND S1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O2 /*월파트너내역*/ ON S1.APY_YM = O2.BASE_YM AND S1.OG_TP_CD = O2.OG_TP_CD AND S1.OG_ID = O2.OG_ID AND S1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO = O2.PRTNR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_OGBS_BLD_BAS O3 ON S1.BLD_CD = O3.BLD_CD AND O1.OG_TP_CD = O3.OG_TP_CD WHERE 1 = 1 AND O1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm}
AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W02') /* 매니저 */
AND O1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03','W06') /* 엔지니어 */
AND O1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr1LevlOgId} /* 총괄단조건(1차레벨조직코드) */
AND O1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_ID = #{dgr2LevlOgId} /* 지역단조건(2차레벨조직코드)*/
AND O1.OG_ID = #{ogId} /* 서비스센터 */
AND O2.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /* 엔지니어/매니저 파트너번호 */
AND O1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY O1.BASE_YM, O1.OG_CD ) , PART_INF AS ( /* 품목정보 */ SELECT P1.PD_CD AS PD_CD , P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS PD_PRP_VAL20 , P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 AS PD_PRP_VAL01 FROM WSMDBS.TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL P1 /*상품각사속성상세*/ INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS P2 ON P1.PD_CD = P2.PD_CD AND P2.PD_TP_CD = 'M' /*상품유형코드 : C 복합상품, P 기준상품, S 서비스, M 교재제품, Y 융합상품*/ AND P2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND P1.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND P1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ) , INQRY_LIST AS ( SELECT S1.CNTR_NO , S1.CNTR_SN , S2.PDCT_PD_CD , S3.FXN_PRTNR_NO , S1.VST_DUEDT , S4.COPN_DV_CD /* 1:개인, 2:법인 */ FROM ( SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , SUBSTR(VST_DUEDT, 0, 6) AS VST_DUEDT FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ WHERE VST_DUEDT LIKE #{baseYm}||'%' AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN, SUBSTR(VST_DUEDT, 0, 6) ) S1 /* LC_VISIT_VS107TB 고객서비스정기BS주기내 */ INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ S2 /* LC_ALLOCATE_AC202TB 월별고객서비스대상내역 */ ON S1.VST_DUEDT = S2.MNGT_YM AND S1.CNTR_NO = S2.CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = S1.CNTR_SN AND S2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN( SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , FXN_PRTNR_NO , APY_STRT_YM FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVPD_CNTR_FXN_PRTNR_IZ F1 /* LC_ALLOCATE_AC130TB 계약별고정파트너내역 */ WHERE CH_SN = (SELECT MAX(CH_SN) FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVPD_CNTR_FXN_PRTNR_IZ F2 WHERE F1.CNTR_NO = F2.CNTR_NO AND F1.CNTR_SN = F2.CNTR_SN ) ) S3 ON S1.CNTR_NO = S3.CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = S3.CNTR_SN AND S2.MNGT_YM = S3.APY_STRT_YM INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS S4 /* 계약기본 - 법인, 고객 구분 */ ON S1.CNTR_NO = S4.CNTR_NO AND S4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1 AND S2.REQD_DT IS NULL /* To-Be 컬럼 없어짐 */
) , CUST_INF AS ( /* 관리고객 수 */ SELECT C1.FXN_PRTNR_NO , COUNT(1) AS MNGR_CUST_CNT , O1.BASE_YM FROM WSMDBS.TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ C1 /* LC_ALLOCATE_AC202TB 월별고객서비스대상내역 */ INNER JOIN WSMDBS.TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ C2 /* LC_ALLOCATE_AC201TB 고객서비스수행내역 */ ON C1.CNTR_NO = C2.CNTR_NO AND C1.CNTR_SN = C2.CNTR_SN AND C1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYm} AND C2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF O1 ON C1.FXN_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = O1.OG_TP_CD AND C1.FXN_PRTNR_NO = O1.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1=1 AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY C1.FXN_PRTNR_NO, O1.BASE_YM ) , FNL_INF AS ( SELECT O1.PRTNR_NO AS PRTNR_NO , O1.OG_NM AS OG_NM , O1.PRTNR_KNM AS PRTNR_KNM , O1.PSTN_DV_CD AS PSTN_DV_CD , O1.PSTN_DV_NM AS PSTN_DV_NM , O1.BLD_NM AS BLD_NM , C1.MNGR_CUST_CNT AS MNGR_CUST_CNT , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '2' AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 LIKE '42%' AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 NOT LIKE '4205%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WRFR /* 정수기 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '2' AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 LIKE '4205%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MINI_WRFR /* 미니정수기 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '1' AND I1.COPN_DV_CD = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS BDT_INDV /* 비데-개인 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '1' AND I1.COPN_DV_CD = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS BDT_CRP /* 비데-법인 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ARCL /* 공기청정기 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WTR_SFTNR /* 연수기 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '96' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CFF_MCHN /* 커피머신 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '93' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MSGCR /* 안마의자 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '92' AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 IN ('49210','49211','49230') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WELLS_FARM_WIDE /* 웰스팜 WIDE */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '92' AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 IN ('49220') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WELLS_FARM_SLIM /* 웰스팜 SLIM */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '92' AND P1.PD_PRP_VAL01 IN ('49210','49220','49211','49230') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WELLS_FARM /* 웰스팜 계 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_CD IN ('WM04100121' , 'WM04100152' , 'WM04100153') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DRYR /* 건조기 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_CD IN ('WM02100259', 'WM02100258', 'WM02100257', 'WM02100248', 'WM02100244', 'WM02100249') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ARCON /* 에어컨 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_CD IN ('WM04100164', 'WM04100166', 'WM04100192', 'WM04100193', 'WM04100194', 'WM07101222') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ARDRSSR /* 에어드레서 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_CD IN ('WM04100127' , 'WM04100155' , 'WM04100156') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WASH /* 세탁기 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN P1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = '11' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SDING /* 모종 */ , '' AS FIELD_SUM /* 합계 - 서비스처리 */ FROM INQRY_LIST I1 INNER JOIN OG_PRTNR_WARE_INF O1 ON I1.VST_DUEDT = O1.BASE_YM AND I1.FXN_PRTNR_NO = O1.PRTNR_NO AND 1=1 INNER JOIN PART_INF P1 ON I1.PDCT_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN CUST_INF C1 ON I1.FXN_PRTNR_NO = C1.FXN_PRTNR_NO GROUP BY O1.PRTNR_NO, O1.OG_NM, O1.PRTNR_KNM, O1.PSTN_DV_CD, O1.PSTN_DV_NM, O1.BLD_NM, C1.MNGR_CUST_CNT )
SELECT PRTNR_NO , OG_NM , PRTNR_KNM , PSTN_DV_CD , PSTN_DV_NM , BLD_NM , MNGR_CUST_CNT , WRFR /* 정수기 */ , MINI_WRFR /* 미니정수기 */ , BDT_INDV /* 비데-개인 */ , BDT_CRP /* 비데-법인 */ , ARCL /* 공기청정기 */ , WTR_SFTNR /* 연수기 */ , CFF_MCHN /* 커피머신 */ , MSGCR /* 안마의자 */ , WELLS_FARM_WIDE /* 웰스팜 WIDE */ , WELLS_FARM_SLIM /* 웰스팜 SLIM */ , WELLS_FARM /* 웰스팜 계 */ , DRYR /* 건조기 */ , ARCON /* 에어컨 */ , ARDRSSR /* 에어드레서 */ , WASH /* 세탁기 */ , SDING /* 모종 */ , (WRFR + MINI_WRFR + BDT_INDV + BDT_CRP + ARCL + WTR_SFTNR + CFF_MCHN + MSGCR + WELLS_FARM_WIDE + WELLS_FARM_SLIM + WELLS_FARM + DRYR + ARCON + ARDRSSR + WASH + SDING) AS FIELD_SUM /* 합계 - 서비스처리 */ FROM FNL_INF WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY BLD_NM, PRTNR_KNM
